# CMake settings for the SQLLite library. Note that the SQLite source code
# is PUBLIC DOMAIN, and is NOT released under the Boost Software License.

# CMake file for third-party libraries

add_subdirectory(sqlite)
add_subdirectory(yaml-cpp)
